programme.desc: When Anthony Wall, a young music journalist and radio trainee, joined the BBC Arena team in 1978, he had no idea what lasting impact this documentary arts strand would have on his life and career. Under the guidance of series editor Alan Yentob and working alongside director Nigel Finch, films such as My Way, Desert Island Discs and The Private Life of the Ford Cortina would breathe new life into arts programming in the UK.

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: An investigation of the appeal and power of the popular song My Way, which was written by Paul Anka and was recorded by many artists, including Frank Sinatra, Shirley Bassey, Elvis Presley and Sid Vicious. Contributors include Paul Anka, George Brown, Barry John and Dorothy Squires.

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: Revealing the extraordinary life of one of the greatest English writers of the twentieth century. programme.title: Arena

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: There is public confusion when King Charles II bans coffee shops and a seasick chicken ruins a Roman sea battle. Later, mighty Egyptian Pharaoh, Ramesses II, meets some smelly peasants on Historical Wife Swap, and a cave-dwelling Stone Age couple try to buy their first house.

programme.title: Horrible Histories

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is forced to hold an important business meeting at the doctors office when Debra and the children fall ill, and Ray also worries about becoming a bad father.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is insecure about his looks after hearing Debra complement Robert on his appearance. Not wanting to be considered `adorable like a hamster, Ray gets a head-to-toe makeover, including a fake tan.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra is upset when Ray buys back his old car, affectionately known as the `make-out mobile.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray tries to replace the diamond in Debras wedding ring without her knowing when he discovers it is fake, and Robert decides to surprise his new girlfriend after learning that her favourite colour is green.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One That Could Have Been
programme.desc: In the second episode showing what could have happened to the friends had their lives taken different paths, Carol and Ross decide to have a threesome to spice up their marriage, while Rachel goes to Joeys and kisses him and then catches Barry cheating.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler gets into trouble with his homemade gift for Monica, Ross tries to teach martial arts to Rachel and Phoebe, and Joey hires a look-alike.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Dates a Student
programme.desc: When a fire damages their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe must choose between living temporarily with Joey or Monica. Meanwhile, Ross gets into trouble at work, and Chandler tries to help Joeys career.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross worries when his student girlfriend Liz goes on holiday with her wild friends. Meanwhile, Rachel is desperate to find a date for a charity ball, and Joeys fridge breaks down.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.
programme.desc: Joey is excited about his audition for a major television action series about a man and his crimefighting robot, but Chandler almost ruins everything.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Meets Elizabeths Dad
programme.desc: Ross fails to impress his girlfriends father who proves tricky to get on with, and Phoebe makes Chandler and Monica paranoid by chronicling their every move in a supposedly fictional book she is writing.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Pauls the Man
programme.desc: Ross accidentally takes Elizabeth to the same cabin where Elizabeths strict father takes Rachel for a romantic vacation, and Monica panics Chandler by planning their wedding.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Since she is the only one who knows that Chandler plans to ask Monica to marry him, Phoebe helps Chandler shop for a wedding ring, while Rachels wish for Paul to reveal his emotions creates a new set of problems.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers romantic marriage proposal is ruined when Monicas former boyfriend returns, Joey accidentally buys a boat, and a dormitory incident reminds Ross how young his girlfriend is.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica is left reeling from Richards declaration that he loves her and wants to marry her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is toasting Chandler and Monicas engagement, but after Chandler fails to come up with the goods in the bedroom, he begins to worry about the consequences. Elsewhere, Monica thinks Rachel is trying to steal her glory when she catches her kissing Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monicas dream of a fairytale wedding fizzles out after she learns what her parents have done with her wedding fund. Meanwhile, Rachel fumes when a teasing Joey stumbles across her juicy late-night reading material.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers desperate effort to bond with Monicas dad by playing racquetball backfires when he accidentally gets too up-close-and-personal. Elsewhere, Rachel tries to teach `landlubber Joey how to sail without falling overboard, while Monica seeks to replicate Phoebes late grandmothers secret recipe by deconstructing her last remaining cookie.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel must hire an assistant and agonises over whether to hire an efficient, experienced woman, or sexy young Tag Jones. Ignoring her friends advice, she hires Tag and soon regrets it. To make matters worse, Tag is attracted to Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Engagement Picture
programme.desc: While taking an engagement picture for himself and Monica, Chandler cant stop pulling a strange face, Rachel enlists Joey to take Tag out for a night on the town, and Phoebe and Ross date a couple in the middle of a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Nap Partners
programme.desc: Wedding fever continues when Monica cant decide whether to appoint Rachel or Phoebe as her maid of honour. To help Monica decide, Joey and Ross test them on how they would react in certain wedding situations.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Asim Chaudhry, Maisie Adam and Kerry Godliman
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Asim Chaudhry, Maisie Adam and Kerry Godliman for a brutal roast of the internets weirdest moments, from cringe-inducing memes to the oddest online trends. (S1, E04)

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The next stop on Bradley and Barney Walshs European road trip is Switzerland. They take in the breath-taking views with a ride on a mountain rollercoaster, before exercising their vocal chords when they try the Swiss tradition of yodeling. The following day, Barney arranges a unique way for them to enjoy some local cheese, and then drive to the Contra Dam, where Barney reveals they are about to attempt one of James Bonds most iconic stunts, a petrifying 220 metre-high bungee jump.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The father and son have reached Slovenia, a country that loves its sport. Brads passion for bikes gives Barney an excuse to take his dad motocross racing. After hearing that one in 200 people in Slovenia is a beekeeper, they make a stop to meet one.

programme.sub-title: Tissues, Travel Trailers, Slippers, Motorcycle Helmets
programme.desc: More everyday items are put under the microscope as we discover how travel trailers, motorcycle helmets and tissues are made.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: More everyday items are put under the microscope as we discover how rolling luggage, croissants and U-Locks are made.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Pilot Doug tests his limits while landing on a melting runway, and pilot John Kapsner tries to locate two missing snow-machiners. Meanwhile the Iditarod dog sled race starts.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: On Alaskas North Slope, pilots Doug and John battle to keep their plane from careering off an icy runway. Meanwhile, in Unalakleet, Ariel receives a surprise visitor.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water
programme.desc: Last year, Dustins crew struck a six-ounce, $70K nugget -- the biggest in Gold Rush history. This season, hes risking everything to find more. Its all or nothing -- a gamble that could make them millions or end their mining careers forever.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water
programme.desc: Dustin and his crew reach their boiling points as exhaustion and the lack of gold at The Wall lead to a world-class fallout. Dustin is forced to take drastic action, calling in help from a controversial source.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike has found a rare, 33-year-old Peugeot 405 while in Portugal. But finding parts isnt going to be easy.

programme.title: Goblin Works Garage
programme.desc: Helen S. Stanley, Jimmy de Ville, and Jimmy and Anthony Partridge make up Goblin Works Garage. Together they design and create custom builds to ruffle feathers, challenge perceptions, inspire, infuriate and indulge petrol head fantasies.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Young mining gangster Chris McCully challenges Mr. Golds dominance. Wise guys Kris and Andy prospect. Don Vernon faces health issues. Made man Zeke creates a palace on the ice. A pregnant Emily leaves Jane in charge of the operation.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Innovative mining strategies pay off for Chris and Shawn; a crew screwup leaves Kris once again behind in the gold count; a shocking discovery reveals why Emilys crew hasnt been seeing any gold in the box.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew barters with a baronet and is given a run for his money by a seasoned salvager. Plus, can he make a profit on a collection of late 19th century balconet rails?

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew is in Scotland to bargain for a Victorian canopy and finds some heavyweight items in a boxers backyard. Plus, can he make a profit on a collection of opaline lights?

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: In the Pacific Northwest, Jared Douglas and his logging crew risk life and limb to harvest some of the planets most remote and valuable trees. But getting these giants from the forest to market is deadly.

programme.title: Hoffman Family Gold
programme.desc: Determined to mine a daunting 1,000 ounces of gold this year, Todd Hoffman brings a hand-picked wash plant and all-star crew to his remote Alaskan claim; when they struggle out of the gate, his son Hunter has a bold fix to run his own plant.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers World Tour
programme.desc: Mike and Elvis are going global. This time, the stakes are higher, the deadlines tighter and the motor transformations are more jaw-dropping than ever.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek works to revive a 1960 Chevrolet El Camino with a suspicious past.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Duane and Chad Ollinger resume their hunt for the Aztec gold they believe is hidden under their ranch in Utah. Using new techniques and aided by a renowned treasure hunter, the father and son are closer than ever to finding the treasure.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Mike builds a four-post bed from wood salvaged from a cabin at Smith Mountain Lake; Mike and Ted install fire doors previously salvaged from the Washington Mill.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs

So will Toms ambitious vision to get married in a Mongolian yurt be what Lottys really hoping for?

Its the late 1960s and the Enterprise is an unidentified flying object. How can Captain Kirk extricate himself and his crew without changing history?

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: A recently widowed, ex-film star (Ida Lupino) attempting a comeback suffers traumatic incidents that parallel her early movies.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: A teen infatuated with Colt stows away in his truck, impeding his efforts to find a diamond thief.

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: An old friend turns to Walker for help when his pregnant daughter falls under the spell of a religious cult.

programme.title: Flight of the Intruder
programme.desc: The crew members of a low-flying American bomber disobey orders and bomb a strategic target in Vietnam.

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: Detective Nick Curran is charged with finding out the truth after Catherine Tramell, a sensual bisexual writer, is suspected of murdering her lover with an ice pick, exactly the method used in one of her books. Unfortunately, he becomes too closely involved.

programme.title: Unchained
programme.desc: Three career criminals find themselves trapped in a warehouse. They are hiding from the law who are closing in from the outside. However, an even worse threat is waiting for them on the inside.

programme.title: The Asphyx
programme.desc: A gentleman photographer in Victorian England tries to trap the human spirit at the moment of death.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A Yorkshire woman single-handedly attempts to open a glampsite in the Italian countryside. A London family start an electric bike company in a glamourous Portuguese resort.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: Theres a bittersweet departure for a family running an e-bike business in Portugal. The holiday hosts from Manchester sacrifice their own comfort for their guests in France.

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: An unusual WWII-style renovation in their attic has Emma and Paul at loggerheads. Ben and Billie battle the heat to finish their garden apartment.

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Jayne and Steve are pulled from pillar to post as they host a painting course. Chateau shopper Sarah is smitten with period features, but Bart worries about the level of DIY.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at stately home Anstey Hall in Cambridge, with father and son combo John and Johnny de Bruyne.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit of the competition is to clothes-free Clover Spa and Hotel in Birmingham where owner Tim Higgs hopes to convert his rivals to the joys of naturism.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week is to The Angel Hotel in Coleford, Gloucestershire, managed by Mark Davidson and Layla Caton.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit of the week is to Higher Gitcombe, in Totnes, Devon, where owners Paul and Lynnie Jolly set out to spoil their guests rotten.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: The boys take on a Renault Alpine GTA in need of some TLC. The car belongs to David, a former computer technician suffering with ill health.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz travel to Hampshire to collect a 2000 Ford Mondeo. The car belongs to Karl, a widowed father of two girls.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie and Phil are back! In Oxfordshire, Phil has an uphill battle helping Tan and Steve tick off their wish list. Kirstie attempts to end indecisive Reenas five-year search. (S39 Ep1)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: In south London, Kirstie helps nervous first-time buyers Adam and Nicole, while Phil pulls out all the stops to find Kat the right fit for her million-pound budget.

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: In north London, Penny and Mark Edwards seek to blend period and cutting edge architecture restoring a derelict Victorian gatehouse perched on a very steep hill.

programme.title: Ancient Autopsy: Cleopatra
programme.desc: Professor Suzannah Lipscomb deep dives into the greatest death mysteries of the ancient world. Was Egypts legendary queen Cleopatra really killed by a snake bite?

programme.title: Ancient Egypt by Train
programme.desc: Starting in Alexandria, Alice goes deep underground in search of Cleopatra. She discovers how the Romans and the Greeks reacted to the treasures of Ancient Egypt, and learns how a slave became a sultan and built his own fairy tale caste.

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Paramedics are called to a man whos bleeding from his ears, a woman whos recently had bowel surgery and is losing blood, and an eight-month-old with a fever.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: This episode looks at three daughters and their love for their mother. Eighty-year-old Rose has fluid on her lungs and is having trouble breathing. Her three daughters Christine, Sandra and Debbie put on brave faces around their mothers bedside, convincing her that everything will be all right, but in the relatives room there is high emotion as they tearfully contemplate life without her.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: The series continues with a powerful cautionary episode about events that shock people into reflecting on the way they live their lives. Neil was driving a friends sports car when he was involved in a head-on collision with another vehicle. After remaining trapped in the wreckage for over an hour, hes flown by helicopter to Kings AandE. Meanwhile in Minors, two patients have come in as the result of daredevil antics.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Diana, princess of the Amazons, is raised to be an unconquerable warrior on a sheltered island paradise. She discovers her full powers and true destiny after leaving home to join the fight to end all wars.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: Quiet teacher Will Gerard is sucked into a world of vigilantism when his wife Laura is brutally attacked.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator (Kit Harington) races to save the woman (Emily Browning) he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: SAS: Red Notice
programme.desc: A grooms wedding plans are disrupted when a small army of well-trained criminals, led by Laszlo Antonov, hijack the Eurostar deep beneath the English Channel.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he resumes his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick OConnell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: When Trojan prince Paris woos Helen, Queen of Sparta, away from her husband Menelaus, the legendary warrior Achilles is called to lead the armies of Greece against the city fortress of Troy.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A Mexican village is at the mercy of Calvera, the leader of a band of outlaws. The townspeople, too afraid to fight for themselves, hire seven American gunslingers to free them from the bandits raids. The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: Quiet teacher Will Gerard is sucked into a world of vigilantism when his wife Laura is brutally attacked.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon

programme.title: Dr. Seuss the Lorax
programme.desc: A young boy searches for a way to gain the affections of his dream-girl. In his quest he learns that in order to succeed he must uncover the story of the grumpy but nature-loving Lorax.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: A sloth named Laura and her family move to the big city with nothing but their prized family recipe book and a rusted old food truck. The familys delicious food soon catches the eye of a quick-witted cheetah named Dotti.

programme.title: The Rugrats Movie
programme.desc: Tommy and his plucky pals go on a forest adventure in his fathers latest invention, the Reptar Wagon.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: The children and their bickering family are stranded on a desert island. Fortunately help is at hand from the Thornberry family, who are visiting the island to film a rare snow leopard. Once again, animal-understanding Eliza saves the day.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: With the evil wizard Gargamel hot on their trail, Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty embark on a journey through the Forbidden Forest to find a mysterious village.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: An ordinary chameleon, Rango, winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in need of a new sheriff.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Po might just be the laziest, clumsiest panda in the Valley of Peace, but he secretly dreams of becoming a kung fu legend. When the villainous snow leopard Tai Lung threatens Pos homeland, the hapless panda is chosen to fulfil an ancient prophecy and defend the Valley from attack. Training under Master Shifu, Po embarks on an epic high-kicking adventure as he sets out to thwart Tai Lungs evil plans. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: The Inseparables
programme.desc: A runaway puppet with an overactive imagination and an abandoned stuffed animal in need of a friend meet in Central Park and join forces to try and find a home for the both of them.

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Rugrats are in Paris where Chuckies widowed father has been called on to mend an animated monster in a theme park, but its all a ploy by Coco LaBouche - the parks head, to get appointed head of a major company. As she and her henchman Jean-Claude plan to ensnare him, only the rest of the Rugrats can stop him falling for her charms.

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: A sloth named Laura and her family move to the big city with nothing but their prized family recipe book and a rusted old food truck. The familys delicious food soon catches the eye of a quick-witted cheetah named Dotti.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Manodrome
programme.desc: Tormented by personal demons, Ralphie encounters a mysterious organization of men who welcome him as one of their own. As he struggles to define himself, pressure mounts and a powder keg is lit as he blows a hole in the lives of everyone he touches.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Speak Like a Child
programme.desc: A dark secret binds together three longtime friends who lived together at a childrens home.

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: When Rydell new boy Michael meets hot Pink Lady Stephanie he is instantly smitten, but Michaels a geek and top T-Bird Johnny wants Stephanie back. Will an image change help him get the girl?

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: Manodrome
programme.desc: Tormented by personal demons, Ralphie encounters a mysterious organization of men who welcome him as one of their own. As he struggles to define himself, pressure mounts and a powder keg is lit as he blows a hole in the lives of everyone he touches.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Following a group of Los Angeles residents who try to find their way through the highs and lows of love during a single day.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: Creepy fairy tale following the fortunes of a young orphan who becomes embroiled in a supernatural adventure. Brought up on his kindly grandmothers scary stories about witches, he stumbles on a real coven while on holiday. Overhearing their plans to capture all the children in Britain, he sets out to stop them, remaining undeterred throughout - even when he has been turned into a mouse.

programme.title: Spy Kids 3: Game Over
programme.desc: The Spy Kids set off on their third adventure. Secret Agent Carmen finds herself trapped in a 3-D virtual reality video game designed by their new arch nemesis, the Toymaker. Juni must save his sister, as they battle it out against lifelike 3-D monsters, completing each progressively harder level and ultimately trying to save the youth of the world.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: A thrilling modern day take on Charles Dickens novel, `Oliver Twist, as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A group of talking dogs save the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: In stifling Edwardian London, Wendy Darling mesmerises her brothers every night with bedtime tales of swordplay, swashbuckling and the fearsome Captain Hook. However, the children become the heroes of an even greater story, when Peter Pan flies into their nursery one night and leads them over moonlit rooftops through a galaxy of stars and to the lush jungles of Neverland.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an unsophisticated single mother who stumbles upon an environmental cover-up. While working for a lawyer, she is puzzled by an old case and decides to do some research of her own. She discovers that a chemical company knowingly polluted the local area, and with the help of the lawyer launches a class action to sue the company for damages.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: An uncouth FBI agent goes undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant to flush out a terrorist who plans to bomb the event. The hard-nosed cop, who prides herself on her toughness, must discard her trainers and feminise her behaviour if she is to avoid blowing her cover.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss; she cant remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that hes in it for love.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A Madison Avenue photographer transforms a timid saleswoman into one of the fashion worlds most glamorous models. The Gershwin-scored film includes `How Long Has This Been Going On?, He Loves and She Loves, and `S Wonderful.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A Madison Avenue photographer transforms a timid saleswoman into one of the fashion worlds most glamorous models. The Gershwin-scored film includes `How Long Has This Been Going On?, He Loves and She Loves, and `S Wonderful.

programme.desc: A Madison Avenue photographer transforms a timid saleswoman into one of the fashion worlds most glamorous models. The Gershwin-scored film includes `How Long Has This Been Going On?, He Loves and She Loves, and `S Wonderful.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: A science professor and his cohorts battle a slew of rapidly growing alien organisms that threaten to overrun the Earth.

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: An honest and good-hearted priest wrestles with a cynical and spiteful community after he receives a death threat from an unknown parishioner.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Mercenary Josh Hartnett is assigned a target on a flight. But when rival assassins board the plane, assassin and target are forced to team up. Gory action thriller. (2025, 98 mins)

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two high-school nerds accidentally create the woman of their dreams when an electrical storm zaps their home computer.

programme.title: Ferris Buellers Day Off
programme.desc: A teen perpetrates a series of elaborate deceptions to ensure that he and two friends spend a carefree day in Chicago.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto is forced to come out of hiding when a loved one is brutally murdered. Heading to LA to track down the culprit, he crosses paths with Brian OConnor, the FBI agent whose undercover infiltration of Torettos gang led to the motorised miscreants exile across the border. The two men temporarily put their differences aside as they investigate the killing.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Baby Driver

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: A science professor and his cohorts battle a slew of rapidly growing alien organisms that threaten to overrun the Earth.

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: An honest and good-hearted priest wrestles with a cynical and spiteful community after he receives a death threat from an unknown parishioner.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Mercenary Josh Hartnett is assigned a target on a flight. But when rival assassins board the plane, assassin and target are forced to team up. Gory action thriller. (2025, 98 mins)

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two high-school nerds accidentally create the woman of their dreams when an electrical storm zaps their home computer.

programme.title: Ferris Buellers Day Off
programme.desc: A teen perpetrates a series of elaborate deceptions to ensure that he and two friends spend a carefree day in Chicago.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto is forced to come out of hiding when a loved one is brutally murdered. Heading to LA to track down the culprit, he crosses paths with Brian OConnor, the FBI agent whose undercover infiltration of Torettos gang led to the motorised miscreants exile across the border. The two men temporarily put their differences aside as they investigate the killing.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helms daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: When a perfect night with a perfect stranger ends suddenly the next morning, Charlotte searches for answers and meaning in her life. However, she soon uncovers a shocking secret that changes everything she knows about the man who captured her heart.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Cinema List: Horror Villians

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: Parents take drastic measures when it seems their new home is haunted and their comatose son is possessed by a malevolent entity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: While quarantining at her familys lake house during the pandemic, Parker and her best friend are threatened by an unexpected visitor.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: While trying to salvage her career, a disgraced journalist begins investigating a strange conspiracy theory. However, as the trail leads uncomfortably close to home, shes left to grapple with the lies at the heart of her own story.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Videodrome
programme.desc: A television executive searching for the ultimate show for his sex-based network comes across `Videodrome, a pirate broadcast of what appears to be pornographic snuff films. Trying to track down the makers, he enters a world of extreme sex and violence in one of David Cronenbergs early films that, while explicit, also satirises the media industry and its attempts at mind-control.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Anora

programme.desc: Alison receives footage of a pet Tamarin monkey in need of a home, Bruce the loris gets a check-up and golden-cheeked gibbons Kim and Tien get cosy.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Join Lizzie on her most perilous Atlantic adventure yet, free diving with bull sharks. Explore otherworldly Gulf Coast swamps teeming with hungry alligators and crafty snapping turtles. Discover tiny but mighty beach mice that strengthen sand dunes.

programme.title: Beast of The Big Blue
programme.sub-title: Te Tau Ihu/ Top Of The South
programme.desc: Te Tau Ihu/ Top the South: Traverse one the longest natural sandbars side-by-side with pilot whales, then swim amongst dolphins and fur seals through drowned river valleys.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong
programme.desc: Cambodia is a country that lies almost entirely within the Mekong basin, flanked by Thailand, Laos and Vietnam. The Mekong travels the length of the country entering in the north and tracking south, cutting the region into two halves.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: A hurricane slams the rehab and blasts an osprey nest out of its tree. Hope scrambles to save the babies.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: Beni, obsessed with food, shudders as he receives a dramatic, educational smackdown from the local dominant male, Petruk. Meanwhile, Spanser, a spoiled rich kid and former illegal pet, attempts to control his sweet tooth.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed
programme.desc: The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighbourhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, its a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Join Lizzie on her most perilous Atlantic adventure yet, free diving with bull sharks. Explore otherworldly Gulf Coast swamps teeming with hungry alligators and crafty snapping turtles. Discover tiny but mighty beach mice that strengthen sand dunes.

programme.title: Beast of The Big Blue
programme.sub-title: Te Tau Ihu/ Top Of The South
programme.desc: Te Tau Ihu/ Top the South: Traverse one the longest natural sandbars side-by-side with pilot whales, then swim amongst dolphins and fur seals through drowned river valleys.

programme.title: Wildlife Rescue New Zealand
programme.desc: A precious yellow eyed penguin has been mauled by a dog and the vets at Dunedin Wildlife Hospital are working hard to save its life.

From Champions League triumphs at Chelsea to high-stakes drama at Arsenal, his career was packed with silverware and great stories. In this episode, we explore the man behind the headlines: a leader, a teammate, and a born entertainer. Now back in Brazil, Luiz opens up on life after the Premier League and his plans for the future.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey through western Scotland by exploring the industrial heartland of Glasgow and its mighty River Clyde before taking the ferry to the island of Cumbrae. He is put to work behind the scenes at Glasgows circular subway, explores the future of shipbuilding on the Clyde.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo falls into line with the University of Glasgows Officer Training Corps. Founded in the early 20th century, the Corps flourishes today and Michael joins students for drill. From Glasgow, Michael heads west along the Firth of Clyde to Helensburgh, where he discovers a pioneering group of artists known as the Glasgow Boys.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: n Warwicks medieval castle he uncovers the scene of an extravagant and scandalous ball, which changed the life of its hostess, Daisy Greville, Countess of Warwick.At Cowley, Michael marvels at a spectacularly automated state-of-the-art production line producing 1,000 Minis a day and probes the pre-First World War origins of the Morris Oxford.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo picks up his rail journey from Warwick to Rye along the River Thames. In Reading, he traces the origins of education for workers. Messing about in boats is the name of the game in Henley on Thames, where Michael slips into a launch to hear about the world-famous regatta. Afternoon tea on the bank offers a chance to hear about four heroes of early 20th-century literary classic `The Wind in the Willows.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul sets out for County Durham in order to collect both a 1936 Singer Le Mans sports car and a pristine 1957 Lambretta LD 150. In the meantime, Derek gets his hands on a 1962 MGA MK2 Coupe.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek is reunited with the vehicle he took his driving test in, a 1957 Ford 100E Estate. Meanwhile, Paul heads north to collect a 50-year-old MGBGT that still smells like a new car.

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: Facing defeat on the Eastern Front, Hitler retreats. Deep rifts emerge as his inner circle vies for power, the resistance gets a student voice, and an enemy within plots to kill Hitler.

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: Aircraft restoration expert Mark Masters and his son James rebuild a 1943 US Army Aeronca Defender liaison plane for its German owner.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visit Plas Newydd in Wales, where finds include a Victorian cane, a tollgate made from the Menai suspension bridge, a toilet from the 1840s, two toy giraffes, and an 18th-century grandmother clock.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce introduces a unique celebration of the life and reign of Queen Elizabeth II from Balmoral Castle. Highlights include a recording of a speech the young Princess Elizabeth made on Childrens Hour in 1940.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team fall for a Subaru Pick-up, which has all the Mathewsons in agreement. But will it all come crashing down when picking up parts proves tricky?

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A 1973 Ford Escort Mexico is the teams most expensive purchase to date. To save some cash Derek helps on their second buy - a 1968 Riley Kestrel.

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: Facing defeat on the Eastern Front, Hitler retreats. Deep rifts emerge as his inner circle vies for power, the resistance gets a student voice, and an enemy within plots to kill Hitler.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels through the wilderness of Patagonia at the foot of the South American continent. Simons journey takes him up to the huge South Patagonian ice field, through the foothills of the Andes towards the great Grey Glacier of Chile.

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve visits the tropical Indian Ocean islands of Madagascar, Mauritius and the Seychelles. He goes spear fishing with the Madagascan Vezo people, sees the vast industrial tuna trawlers unloading their catch in Mauritius, and meets an eccentric Englishman in the Seychelles who is fighting back by turning his private paradise island into the worlds smallest national park.

programme.title: Russia with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The second leg of Simon Reeves journey across Russia begins in Siberia and takes him to Russias far south west and the majestic Caucasus Mountains. From Lake Baikal, the oldest and deepest lake on earth, he takes the Trans-Siberian railway to the city of Krasnoyarsk - the scene of brutal violence in the 1990s - where a cafe now pays homage to Russias president Vladimir Putin.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: The homes of Britain are stacked with unwanted possessions. Henry Cole and Simon OBrien are here to turn them into hard cash. This time theyre in stitches over some serious sewing machines in Kent.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: This episode features remains of a correctional facility in Atlanta, USA, forgotten remnants of fraud and fusion in Argentina and an ancient complex in Cambodia.
